alert.note: Alert for Christian; Hopkins; Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:00PM EDT until June 29 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Muhlenberg County in south central Kentucky... Northern Christian County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until noon CDT. * At 1100 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Providence to Weir, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. Tree damage has been reported in Madisionville. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madisonville, Dawson Springs, Earlington, Nortonville, Mortons Gap, Crofton, White Plains, St. Charles, Nebo and Hawkins. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 94 and 118. Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 47. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 13 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
